articles.title: Structural basis for bacterial energy extraction from atmospheric hydrogen - Nature.com
articles.description: Structural and biochemical studies of the Mycobacterium smegmatis hydrogenase Huc provides insights into how [NiFe] hydrogenases oxidize trace amounts of atmospheric hydrogen and transfer the electrons liberated via quinone transport.
articles.content:

articles.author: Connor Boyd, Mansur Shaheen
articles.title: Pictured: Cambodian girl, 11, who became 2023's first bird flu victim - Daily Mail
articles.description: DailyMail.com has spoken to the family of Bean Narong, 11, who died of the bird flu last month. Her family, who reside in Prey Veng, Cambodia, say she may have gotten it from an infected chicken wing.
articles.content:
A Cambodian schoolgirl who became 2023's first bird flu victim can be pictured for the first time today. 
Eleven-year-old Bean Narong died on February 22 after catching Type A HN51 in the impoverish… [+13237 chars]
